issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

FAILURE: Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #9771 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/9771/])
HDFS-10410. RedundantEditLogInputStream.LOG is set to wrong class. (John (lei: rev 6a6e74acf5c38a4995c4622148721cfe2f1fbdad)
* hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/server/namenode/RedundantEditLogInputStream.java

The change is trivial. It provides more clear context for the log messages.

+1. Thanks a lot, [~jzhuge]!
